channel.title: Hi, I'm Mike founder of Bubeat.com - a business metrics Saas
channel.description:
I am a senior web developer (backend mainly) with the 'unique' dream to become a successful entrepreneur and bubeat.com is my latest product . I stumble upon Bootstrapped on a reddit comment, so here I am, eager to talk with like-minded people about startup growth.
It' a pleasure to meeting you all!
